description:
### 11.23 cas

Apply Contrast Adaptive Sharpen filter to video stream.

The filter accepts the following options:

**strength**

    Set the sharpening strength. Default value is 0. 

**planes**

    Set planes to filter. Default value is to filter all planes except alpha plane.
name: cas

options.description: Set the sharpening strength. Default value is 0.
options.name: strength

options.description: Set planes to filter. Default value is to filter all planes except alpha plane.
options.name: planes
